product_name: Fox Head Inc Indicator Bike Jersey - Men's
long_description: A relaxed fit means the men's Indicator Bike Jersey from Fox Head Inc. is your choice for weekend rides with buddies where you're not tracking the time. Polyester fabric wicks moisture and dries fast to keep you comfortable. Mesh side panels enhance airflow. Droptail covers your rear in the ride position. Raglan sleeves eliminate shoulder seams for increased range of motion and comfort. Indicator Bike Jersey from Fox Head Inc. features an optics wipe on the inside of hem.
short_description: A relaxed fit means the men's Indicator Bike Jersey from Fox Head Inc. is your choice for weekend rides with buddies where you're not tracking the time.
